meta.title: Ozio Group | Join the Team
meta.description: Ozio Group - The European home services marketplace. Join a team that makes a difference.

hero.headline: Where Urgency Meets Expertise.
hero.subheadline: The European marketplace connecting B2B/B2C clients with qualified technicians — locksmiths, plumbers, electricians, glaziers, and more. Meaningful work with real impact.

marketplace.headline: What We Do
marketplace.description: Ozio connects homeowners in urgent need with trusted tradespeople. When a family is locked out at -5°C, we find a locksmith in 25 minutes. When a leak threatens a home, we dispatch a qualified plumber.

about.headline: About Ozio
about.intro: Since 2016, we've been connecting homeowners in urgent need with trusted tradespeople across Europe. A technology marketplace built around human moments.

culture.headline: Our Culture
culture.intro: Authentic conversations. Empowered decisions. Work that matters to the people we serve.

items.title: Transparent
items.description: Open communication at every level. Immediate feedback, collaborative problem-solving. When something needs addressing, we address it together.

items.title: Committed
items.description: Excellence as a standard. Each interaction is an opportunity, each intervention a responsibility. The work matters, so we bring our best.

items.title: Equitable
items.description: Fairness for everyone — customers, artisans, colleagues. Trust is built through consistent actions over time.

antiRobot.headline: Human-Centered Operations
antiRobot.description: At Ozio, you bring judgment to every situation. A family locked out at midnight requires a different approach than a Sunday water leak. You're empowered to make decisions that have genuine impact.
points: Diverse challenges — each day brings something new

soul.headline: Why It Matters
soul.intro: Behind every call, there's a human story. These are the moments that define what we do.

stories.title: Real Emergencies
stories.subtitle: When Every Second Counts
stories.content: A mother with three young children, locked out of their home at -5°C. It was 11 PM on a Tuesday. Our team found an available locksmith in 8 minutes. He arrived in 25 minutes. The children were asleep in their own beds 30 minutes later. The mother called back the next day to thank us for our services.
stories.highlight: Connecting people to solutions, when it matters most.

stories.title: From Finance to Field
stories.subtitle: A Career Transformation
stories.content: Marc spent 12 years in the banking system. Searching for more meaningful work, he made a change. 3 years later, he leads a team of 3 locksmiths and generates €1M in annual revenue through our platform. We supported his journey — from business launch to first customers, through administrative complexities to structured growth.
stories.highlight: Building careers, one partnership at a time.

stories.title: The Sunday Flood
stories.subtitle: When Disaster Strikes
stories.content: 4 AM on a Sunday. A burst pipe in a family home. Water rising fast. Within 12 minutes, we had a plumber en route. He arrived, contained the flood, and stayed until 7 AM to ensure the home was safe. What could have been catastrophic was limited to one room.
stories.highlight: Ready when it matters, around the clock.

departments.headline: Our Teams
departments.intro: Every department contributes to one mission: connecting those who need help with those who can provide it.

items.name: Tech
items.tagline: Building the future of home services
items.description: The platform that orchestrates everything. APIs, algorithmic matching, mobile apps. Modern stack (React, Node, PostgreSQL), meaningful challenges, and autonomy to ship features that matter.

items.name: Marketing
items.description: Acquisition, SEO, brand, and performance marketing. Data-driven campaigns that connect homeowners in need with artisans who can help. €2M+ annual ad spend to optimize.

items.name: Artisan Network
items.tagline: Growing the network, one artisan at a time
items.description: Building and nurturing our partner artisan network. Field relationships, negotiation, onboarding, and retention. The bridge between Ozio and 2,000+ skilled tradespeople.

items.name: Operations
items.description: Coordinating 25,000+ monthly requests. Dispatch optimization, service quality, and process improvement. When a family needs help at midnight, Operations ensures it arrives.

items.name: Support
items.description: First responders for customers and artisans. Problem-solving under pressure, de-escalation, and turning stressful moments into positive experiences. Empathy as a core skill.
